content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Respond to parts a, b, and c.

Briefly describe one way in which economic development influenced migration within the United States from 1890 to 1945.

Briefly explain one similarity in how economic development influenced two regions of the United States from 1945 to 2000.

Briefly explain one difference in how economic development influenced two regions of the United States from 1945 to 2000.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
